getShoppingCart

DataLoader getShoppingCart(java.lang.Boolean includeProducts,
                           DataLoadListener listener)
Retrieve the current user shopping cart.

Parameters:
includeProducts - boolean indicating whether the returned order should include the products in the items
listener -
Returns:
DataLoader object performing a network operation. When returned, it allows the external developer to cancel it in case the app does not need the data anymore

getFulfillmentMethodByOptionId

DataLoader getFulfillmentMethodByOptionId(java.lang.String optionId,
                                          DataLoadListener listener)
Load all fulfillment method value for a particular fulfillment method. Important to load before checkout to check that the selected value is correct in case of timeblocks or blocks

Parameters:
optionId - Id of fulfillment Method
listener -
